item.title: Thousands of Epstein documents taken down after victims identified
item.description: The US Department of Justice faces criticism from victims after names and unredacted images included in latest release.

item.title: Clintons agree to testify on Epstein as vote looms to hold them in contempt of Congress
item.description: The couple previously argued that a House committee's demands were invalid. It is not clear when they will testify.

item.title: Son of Norway's crown princess hears details of rape charges in tense trial for royal family
item.description: Marius Borg HÃ¸iby is accused of 38 charges including four counts of rape in one of the biggest cases in Norway for years.

item.title: Trump says Republicans 'should take over the voting' and 'nationalise' US elections
item.description: American elections are primarily run by state law, and voting is administered by local officials across the country.

item.title: Restored angel fresco resembling Italian PM Meloni sparks investigation
item.description: The artist has denied modelling the fresco on the prime minister.
